attributes.action: change the May Day bank holiday to 'Great Britain day'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rename the May Day holiday 'Great Britain day'. This holiday will be to celebrate everything that is great about our country, past and present. No matter what ethnic background or religion you are from, this day would be for all to celebrate being British. Take pride in GREAT BRITAIN. Governments come and go, but Britain will always be Great. It's about time we celebrated the fact and flew the Union flag in more places and more often. Remind the rest of the world what the 'G' in 'GB' stands for!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
